section.title: XUpdate
section.p: The HTML form editor is using XUpdate, hence it's good to understand the basics of XUpdate

section.title: Editing attributes
section.source: <xsl:template match="xhtml:table"> <node name="Background Color" select="/*/xhtml:table[@tagID='{@tagID}']/@class"> <content> <textarea name="<xupdate:update select="/*/xhtml:table[@tagID='{@tagID}']/@class">" cols="40" rows="2"> <xsl:value-of select="@class"/> </textarea> </content> </node> </xsl:template>
